tool_description: Assesses signs of skin aging including wrinkles, elasticity loss, and age-related texture changes.

fine_lines_count.description: Number of visible fine lines around eyes and mouth (0-20)

deep_wrinkles.description: Number of deeper wrinkles or expression lines (0-10)

skin_firmness.description: Skin firmness level (1-5, where 1=very loose, 5=very firm)

elasticity_test.description: Skin bounce-back after pinching: immediate, slow, very_slow

age_spots.description: Presence of age spots or sun spots

error_messages: Invalid line count: fine_lines_count must be integer between 0-20.
Invalid wrinkle count: deep_wrinkles must be integer between 0-10.
Invalid firmness scale: skin_firmness must be integer between 1-5.
Invalid elasticity result: elasticity_test must be one of [immediate, slow, very_slow].
Invalid texture changes: texture_changes array can contain 0-8 string items.
Age inconsistency: High line counts should correlate with lower firmness scores.
usage: Perform elasticity test by gently pinching skin on back of hand and observing return time. Count all visible lines and assess overall skin tone and texture.

priority_concerns.description: Most significant aging concerns to address
